items.title: As AI Grows More Complex, Model Builders Rely on NVIDIA
items.summary: Unveiling what it describes as the most capable model series yet for professional knowledge work, OpenAI launched GPT-5.2 in December. The model was trained and deployed on NVIDIA infrastructure, including NVIDIA Hopper and GB200 NVL72 systems.
